description: Manage Azure Relay Service WCF Relay and Authorization Rule.

commands.name: az relay wcfrelay create
commands.summary: Create the Relay Service WCF Relay.
commands.syntax:
az relay wcfrelay create --name
                         --namespace-name
                         --resource-group
                         [--relay-type {Http, NetTcp}]
                         [--requires-client-authorization {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                         [--requires-transport-security {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                         [--user-metadata]
examples: az relay wcfrelay create --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myrelay --relay-type NetTcp

commands.name: az relay wcfrelay delete
commands.summary: Deletes the Relay Service WCF Relay.
examples: az relay wcfrelay delete --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myrelay

commands.name: az relay wcfrelay list
commands.summary: List the WCF Relay by Relay Service Namespace.
examples: az relay wcfrelay list --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace

commands.name: az relay wcfrelay show
commands.summary: Shows the Relay Service WCF Relay Details.
examples: az relay wcfrelay show --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myrelay

commands.name: az relay wcfrelay update
commands.summary: Updates existing Relay Service WCF Relay.
commands.syntax:
az relay wcfrelay update [--add]
                         [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                         [--ids]
                         [--name]
                         [--namespace-name]
                         [--relay-type {Http, NetTcp}]
                         [--remove]
                         [--resource-group]
                         [--set]
                         [--status {Active, Disabled, ReceiveDisabled, SendDisabled}]
                         [--subscription]
                         [--user-metadata]
examples: az relay wcfrelay update --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myrelay
